CustomField.description: This field returns the EnrollmentId+Current Date Time as a GUID and being used in 'CS_EventNotification2V2Systems' flow as part of ADO US # 334984
CustomField.formula: Id + TEXT(MONTH(TODAY())) + TEXT(DAY(TODAY())) + TEXT(HOUR(TIMENOW())) + TEXT(MINUTE(TIMENOW())) + TEXT(SECOND(TIMENOW())) + TEXT(MILLISECOND(TIMENOW()))
CustomField.label: PCx CorrelationId
